title: Liam Payne puckers up to girlfriend Maya Henry in sweet kissing snap
text:
Kissy, kissy (Picture: Liam Payne, Instagram, Splash News)

Liam Payne and his girlfriend Maya Henry have proved just how loved-up they are by puckering up for a kiss in a new photo.

In case you had any doubts about how smitten the new couple are, both Liam, 26, and Maya, 18, shared the same photo of them sharing a sweet kiss on Instagram on Tuesday night.

The overtly affectionate snap shows Maya sitting across Liam’s lap as he wraps his arms around her while passionately having a smooch during their romantic date at London’s Chiltern Firehouse.

Aw, you guys.

They both captioned the image: ‘Kissypoo,’ with the kissing emoji.

It comes just days after the couple made their red carpet debut at his friend Rita Ora’s clothing launch with Escada last week.

The couple looked perfectly stylish with Maya rocking an all-red get-up featuring a polo neck jumper and wide-legged pants, while Liam looked dapper in a black shirt and trousers.

Rita managed to squeeze herself between the pair to take photos and she pretty much twinning with Maya as the pair wore almost matching outfits.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The event came amid Liam’s suggestion that his friendship with Rita while promoting their Fifty Shades of Grey duet For You, impacted his relationship with Cheryl at the time.

Liam told Closer magazine: ‘[My duet with Rita] didn’t do very much for my personal life. But it did a lot for… yeah no, it was good.’

Liam and Maya enjoyed a romantic date at Chiltern Firehouse (Picture: Splash News)

Looking swarve Liam (Picture: Splash News)

The Strip That Down singer added of Rita: ‘I love her, she’s really great and super, super fun to work with. Out of all my collaborations, I’d say she’s one of my favourites.’

Last month, Liam spoke out about his new romance with Maya whom he went public with during a romantic date night in August.

In an interview on Kiss FM, the former One Direction singer said: ‘She’s awesome. It’s got to the point with my life where I’m like, screw this – it’s not worth my happiness.

‘The difference with her is she’s so relaxed that it helps me relax in a situation.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: Liam Payne shares passionate kiss with Maya Henry on romantic date night as their ‘perfect’ romance continues
description: Liam Payne and Maya Henry had all the feels for each other as they shared a passionate kiss on a date at Chiltern Firehouse.
